Module: # 1. Mark each checkbox with [X] when tested and working
# 2. Fill in Tester name and Date when completing tests
# 3. Status: PASS / FAIL / PARTIAL / NOT TESTED
# 4. Test in order: Admin Config → Operations → Stakeholders
# These settings must be configured FIRST before testing other modules

Test Steps: 1. Go to Admin > Config > Basic 2. Add new department 3. View list 4. Edit a department 5. Delete a department
1. Go to Admin > Config > Basic 2. Add new division 3. View list 4. Edit 5. Delete
1. Go to Admin > Config > Basic 2. Add grade 3. View 4. Edit 5. Delete
1. Go to Admin > Config > Basic 2. Add position 3. View 4. Edit 5. Delete
1. Create team 2. Add members to team 3. Set permissions 4. Edit team 5. Remove member
1. Go to Admin > Config > Advanced 2. Add leave type (Sick/Casual/etc) 3. Set quota 4. Edit 5. Delete
1. Add holiday 2. View holidays 3. Edit 4. Delete
1. Add requisition category 2. View 3. Edit 4. Delete
1. Add complaint type 2. View 3. Edit 4. Delete
1. Add notice type 2. View 3. Edit 4. Delete
1. Add attendance site 2. View sites 3. Edit 4. Delete

Module: # Test as a regular employee user

Test Steps: 1. Go to Ops > Leave 2. Submit new leave request 3. View your requests 4. Check if supervisor receives it
1. Go to Ops > Attendance 2. Check in 3. Check out 4. View your attendance history
1. Go to Ops > Requisition 2. Submit new request 3. View your requests 4. Edit pending request
1. Go to Ops > Settlement 2. Submit settlement claim 3. Attach files 4. View history
1. Go to Ops > Complaint 2. Submit complaint (try anonymous too) 3. View your complaints
1. Go to Ops > Notice 2. View published notices 3. Check department filter works
1. Go to Ops > Tasks 2. Create task 3. View tasks 4. Mark complete 5. Delete task
1. Go to Ops > Projects 2. Create project 3. Add milestone 4. Update status 5. Delete

Module: # Test as a supervisor or admin user with approval permissions

Test Steps: 1. Go to Ops > Leave 2. View pending requests 3. Approve one 4. Reject one with comment
1. View pending requisitions 2. Approve one 3. Reject one
1. View pending settlements 2. Approve/Reject with comment
1. View submitted complaints 2. Update status 3. Add resolution comment
1. Create notice 2. Set department scope 3. Edit notice 4. Delete notice
1. Generate payroll 2. View records 3. Add adjustment 4. Publish 5. Mark as Paid
1. Create stakeholder 2. View list 3. Search/filter 4. Edit details 5. Change status (Lead→Permanent)
1. Create issue for stakeholder 2. View issues 3. Update status 4. Resolve with checker approval
1. Go to Admin > Config > Stakeholder Process 2. Create process 3. Add steps 4. Edit 5. Delete
1. Create issue category 2. Add subcategories 3. Edit 4. Delete
1. Create stakeholder type 2. View 3. Edit 4. Delete
1. Create transaction 2. View list 3. Filter by status/date 4. Edit 5. Delete

Module: # Navigate: Sidebar → HRIS (for employees) or Onboarding flow

Test Steps: 1. Go to Finder 2. Search employee by name/email 3. View employee details
1. View pending employees 2. Approve new employee 3. Reject with reason
1. View active employees 2. Process offboarding 3. Set exit type (Resigned/Terminated)
1. View pending devices 2. Approve device 3. Reject device 4. Delete device
1. View your profile 2. Update personal info 3. View company info
1. Check notification bell 2. View notifications 3. Mark as read 4. Delete notification
